questions.question: 1. Which of the following code can be the dual code of $(7,3,5)$?
2. Which of the following field can construct $(63,57,7)$ RS code?

4. The code generated by the matrix $ G = \begin{bmatrix} 1 & 1 & 1 & 1 & 1 & 1 \\ 1 & 2 & 3 & 4 & 5 & 6  \\ 1 & 4 & 2 & 2 & 4 & 1  \\ 1 & 1 & 6 & 1 & 6 & 6  \\ 1 & 2 & 4 & 4 & 2 & 1 \end{bmatrix}$  over the field $\mathbb{F}_{7}$ is Reed-Solomon code
5. Message polynomial of the bit stream $010110111100$ over the Galois field $\mathbb{F}_{2^{3}}[X]$ is

6. Consider $(7,4,4)$ RS code over Galois field 
$\mathbb{F}_{2^{3}} = \{ 0, 1, \alpha, \alpha^{2}, \alpha^{3} = 1+\alpha, \alpha^{4} = \alpha+\alpha^{2}, \alpha^{5}=1+\alpha+\alpha^{2}, \alpha^{6}= 1+\alpha^{2}  \}$ with evaluation set $ \{\alpha_{1} = 1, \alpha_{2} = \alpha, \alpha_{3} = \alpha^{2}, \alpha_{4} = \alpha^{3}, \alpha_{5} = \alpha^{4},\alpha_{6} = \alpha^{5}, \alpha_{7} = \alpha^{6} \}$. Then the encoded message bit stream of $010110111100$ (same as the above question) is
